title: Responsive Image Gallery Web App Optimized for Android TV, Phone, and Tablet (Android 10+)

requirements.text: Implement an image gallery application UI that works well on Android TV browsers and on Android phones/tablets (Android 10+), with a responsive layout that supports both 10-foot (TV) viewing and touch/handheld use.

quotes:
Create android tv app for  image gallery app with slide show, next previous, zoom in, zoomout and more options .
Compatible withe android 10 and above
Compatible with  android phone and tablet

acceptanceCriteria: UI is usable at TV distance: large focusable controls, readable typography, and clear focus outlines
Layout adapts to common breakpoints for TV, tablet, and phone without horizontal scrolling
All user-facing text is in English

requirements.text: Provide a gallery data flow that lets users populate the gallery by adding images via direct URL and by uploading image files (JPG/PNG/WebP) from the browser, then display them as thumbnails in a grid view.

quotes: Create android tv app for  image gallery app

acceptanceCriteria: Users can add an image by pasting a URL and it appears in the gallery grid after saving
Users can upload image files and they appear in the gallery grid after saving
Each image item in the gallery has at least: id, title (optional), source (URL or stored blob), and createdAt

requirements.text: Implement a full-screen image viewer with Next/Previous navigation controls and remote-friendly keyboard support (D-pad/arrow keys, Enter/OK, Back/Escape).
acceptanceCriteria: On-screen Next/Previous controls work via click/tap and keyboard (ArrowLeft/ArrowRight)
Back/Escape exits the viewer to the gallery grid
The currently viewed image index is visible (e.g., “3 / 20”)

requirements.text: Add slideshow mode with configurable interval and controls to Play/Pause; slideshow must advance through images and integrate with Next/Previous (manual navigation should reset/continue logically).
acceptanceCriteria: User can start slideshow from the viewer and pause/resume it
User can change the slideshow interval (at least: 3s, 5s, 10s)
During slideshow, images advance automatically and loop or stop at the end (choose one behavior and apply consistently)

requirements.text: Implement zoom controls (Zoom In, Zoom Out, Reset) in the viewer with smooth scaling and panning/dragging when zoomed; support TV remote and touch/mouse interactions.
acceptanceCriteria: Zoom In/Out buttons change the scale with defined min/max limits
Reset returns the image to “fit to screen” (or equivalent) with centered position
When zoomed in, user can pan the image via drag (mouse/touch) and via keyboard (arrow keys) in viewer mode

requirements.text: Add “more options” menu in the viewer with at least: Fit to Screen / Actual Size toggle, Rotate Left/Right (90°), and optional image info (dimensions, source type, createdAt).
acceptanceCriteria: More options are accessible via an on-screen button and via keyboard
Rotate controls update the displayed image orientation immediately
Fit/Actual size toggles update the transform behavior consistently

requirements.text: Create Motoko backend endpoints to store and retrieve gallery items, supporting both URL-based images and uploaded image blobs, and expose a stable API used by the React app (React Query).
acceptanceCriteria: Backend supports: create image item, list image items, get image item, delete image item
Uploaded image blobs can be retrieved by the frontend for rendering (e.g., via a query returning bytes or data URL parts)
State persists across canister upgrades without requiring a migration in this initial stage

requirements.text: Ensure TV-friendly accessibility and focus management: all interactive elements must be reachable by keyboard navigation, with visible focus states and sensible tab order.
acceptanceCriteria: All buttons/menus can be operated without a mouse (keyboard-only)
Focus is trapped appropriately in modal/menus and restored on close
Focusable elements show a clear focus ring/outline on TV

requirements.text: Apply a coherent visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, component style) suitable for a living-room gallery experience; avoid blue/purple as dominant colors.

quotes: Create android tv app for  image gallery app

acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across gallery grid, viewer, menus, and settings
Controls are high-contrast and readable on TV
Dominant palette is not blue/purple

requirements.text: Add generated static assets (logo and a subtle background texture) and render them from frontend/public/assets/generated within the app UI (e.g., header branding and optional background).

quotes: Create android tv app for  image gallery app

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced by the UI
Assets load without requiring backend image routing

constraints: Do not implement a native Android APK; deliver as a web application optimized for Android TV/phone/tablet browsers.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; do not introduce additional backend services.
Do not edit files under frontend immutablePaths; compose existing UI components instead.
nonGoals: Direct access to the device’s local photo gallery/storage without user upload (no platform-native media permissions).
Real-time sync, chat, push notifications, or third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity.
External database integration or third-party cloud storage.

required: Minimalist gallery app logo, monochrome-friendly, rounded-square mark (gallery-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Subtle dark textured background pattern suitable for TV UI (gallery-bg-texture.dim_1920x1080.png)
